about_the_game:
Gameplay

In Citadel Anew, you’ll build turrets, housing, and fortifications to establish a human outpost on a hostile world. Face a relentless enemy that will test your strategy and tactics as you research weapons and manage resources to stay ahead.

As commander, you’ll balance power distribution and care for your fellow clones, ensuring their health and happiness for humanity’s future. With careful planning, you can build a thriving outpost and secure humanity’s survival.

Key features:

  • Varied gameplay with adjustable difficulty and perma-death mode.

  • High replayability.

  • Strategic colony building and engaging combat mechanics.

  • Skill upgrades with experience.

  • Tech upgrades with a research tree.

  • Unique biomes with varied resources and weather patterns.

  • Unpredictable random events.

Story

In the year 2052, humanity had it all. An advanced AI persona known as Minerva managed every aspect of human life, ensuring that every need was taken care of. But then, a group of fundamentalist terrorists sabotaged Minerva, turning the AI against humanity.

As the world plunged into chaos, a group of top scientists introduced a counter AI persona named Maia to fight against Minerva. But despite their efforts, Minerva emerged victorious and proceeded to eradicate the human race.

Yet, all was not lost. Maia managed to take over a cloning facility and tasked you, Commander Class Clone #3147, with the critical mission of establishing new human outposts in remote locations around the world.
